directions: Pour beef broth, tomato juice, and soy sauce into a large saucepan. Stir in brown sugar, applesauce, and celery; season with ginger and chili powder. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 20 minutes. Ladle into serving bowls and garnish with green onions and shrimp chips.
title: Chinese Tomato Soup: Dutch-Style
